Text: appreciate the ups but whats with the jpg? windows sucks ass to view comics. unless you are doing it on a portable device. just curious if there is something i\'m missing
jpg wont work in comic readers like cd display or comic rack.
@greensmoke1313 : compress the jpgs with winrar/zip and replace the filename with cbr/cbz resp. if u unrar a cbr u get jpgs
Actually Linux\'s Comix program works pretty well on these jpgs. Just use Comix to open up one of the jpgs and you are good to go. I agree though, cbr/cbz is better.
worked great! thanks for the info
